update lm_pm_shd
loan_no = #{loanNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
ps_perd_no = #{psPerdNo,jdbcType=BIGINT} ,
ps_due_dt = #{psDueDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
ps_bill_dt = #{psBillDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
sbsy_rate = #{sbsyRate,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,
ps_instm_amt = #{psInstmAmt,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,
ps_prcp_amt = #{psPrcpAmt,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,

ps_od_int_amt = #{psOdIntAmt,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,
ps_comm_od_int = #{psCommOdInt,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,
sbsy_int_amt = #{sbsyIntAmt,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,
ps_fee_amt = #{psFeeAmt,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,
prod_prcp_amt = #{prodPrcpAmt,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,
prod_int_amt = #{prodIntAmt,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,
prod_comm_int_amt = #{prodCommIntAmt,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,
prod_fee_amt = #{prodFeeAmt,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,
ps_rem_prcp = #{psRemPrcp,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,
ps_inc_taken = #{psIncTaken,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,
setl_prcp = #{setlPrcp,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,
setl_norm_int = #{setlNormInt,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,
setl_od_int_amt = #{setlOdIntAmt,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,
setl_comm_od_int = #{setlCommOdInt,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,
setl_fee_amt = #{setlFeeAmt,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,
setl_od_inc_taken = #{setlOdIncTaken,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,
setl_inc_taken = #{setlIncTaken,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,
ps_int_rate = #{psIntRate,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,
ps_od_int_rate = #{psOdIntRate,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,
ps_od_ind = #{psOdInd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
last_setl_dt = #{lastSetlDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
ps_od_inc_taken = #{psOdIncTaken,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,
ps_wv_prcp_amt = #{psWvPrcpAmt,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,
ps_wv_nm_int = #{psWvNmInt,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,
ps_wv_od_int = #{psWvOdInt,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,
ps_wv_comm_int = #{psWvCommInt,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,
prcp_state = #{prcpState,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
int_state = #{intState,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
setl_ind = #{setlInd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
comm_od_gen_dt = #{commOdGenDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
pp_er_ind = #{ppErInd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,

grc_prod_int = #{grcProdInt,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,

dc_prcp_amt = #{dcPrcpAmt,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,
dc_norm_int_amt = #{dcNormIntAmt,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,
dc_od_int_amt = #{dcOdIntAmt,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,
dc_comm_od_int = #{dcCommOdInt,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,
dc_ind = #{dcInd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
setl_mode = #{setlMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
accp_issue_dt = #{accpIssueDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
acc_ind = #{accInd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
dftf_dt = #{dftfDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
dftf_amt = #{dftfAmt,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,
dftf_prcp_amt = #{dftfPrcpAmt,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,
dftf_norm_int_amt = #{dftfNormIntAmt,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,
dftf_od_int_amt = #{dftfOdIntAmt,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,
dftf_comm_od_int_amt = #{dftfCommOdIntAmt,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ,

where loan_no= #{loanNo} and ps_perd_no = #{psPerdNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select loan_no, ps_perd_no, ps_due_dt, ps_bill_dt, sbsy_rate, ps_instm_amt, ps_prcp_amt, ps_norm_int_amt, ps_od_int_amt, ps_comm_od_int, sbsy_int_amt, ps_fee_amt, prod_prcp_amt, prod_int_amt, prod_comm_int_amt, prod_fee_amt, ps_rem_prcp, ps_inc_taken, setl_prcp, setl_norm_int, setl_od_int_amt, setl_comm_od_int, setl_fee_amt, setl_od_inc_taken, setl_inc_taken, ps_int_rate, ps_od_int_rate, ps_od_ind, last_setl_dt, ps_od_inc_taken, ps_wv_prcp_amt, ps_wv_nm_int, ps_wv_od_int, ps_wv_comm_int, prcp_state, int_state, setl_ind, comm_od_gen_dt, pp_er_ind, ps_gen_prod_dt, ps_cur_od_inc_taken, grc_prod_prcp, grc_prod_int, grc_prod_comm, dc_instm_amt, dc_prcp_amt, dc_norm_int_amt, dc_od_int_amt, dc_comm_od_int, dc_ind, setl_mode, accp_issue_dt, acc_ind, dftf_dt, dftf_amt, dftf_prcp_amt, dftf_norm_int_amt, dftf_od_int_amt, dftf_comm_od_int_amt, prcs_page_dt_ind, dc_typ from lm_pm_shd where setl_ind = 'N' and loan_no = #{loanNo,jdbcType=INTEGER} and ps_due_dt <= #{psDueDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by ps_perd_no asc

select loan_no, ps_perd_no, ps_due_dt, ps_bill_dt, sbsy_rate, ps_instm_amt, ps_prcp_amt, ps_norm_int_amt, ps_od_int_amt, ps_comm_od_int, sbsy_int_amt, ps_fee_amt, prod_prcp_amt, prod_int_amt, prod_comm_int_amt, prod_fee_amt, ps_rem_prcp, ps_inc_taken, setl_prcp, setl_norm_int, setl_od_int_amt, setl_comm_od_int, setl_fee_amt, setl_od_inc_taken, setl_inc_taken, ps_int_rate, ps_od_int_rate, ps_od_ind, last_setl_dt, ps_od_inc_taken, ps_wv_prcp_amt, ps_wv_nm_int, ps_wv_od_int, ps_wv_comm_int, prcp_state, int_state, setl_ind, comm_od_gen_dt, pp_er_ind, ps_gen_prod_dt, ps_cur_od_inc_taken, grc_prod_prcp, grc_prod_int, grc_prod_comm, dc_instm_amt, dc_prcp_amt, dc_norm_int_amt, dc_od_int_amt, dc_comm_od_int, dc_ind, setl_mode, accp_issue_dt, acc_ind, dftf_dt, dftf_amt, dftf_prcp_amt, dftf_norm_int_amt, dftf_od_int_amt, dftf_comm_od_int_amt, prcs_page_dt_ind, dc_typ from lm_pm_shd where ps_perd_no=(select max(PS_PERD_NO) from Lm_Pm_Shd where loan_No=#{loanNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ps_Due_Dt <= #{psDueDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AND loan_No=#{loanNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
delete from lm_pm_shd where loan_No=#{loanNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from lm_pm_shd where ps_perd_no = (select max(ps_perd_no) from lm_pm_shd where loan_no = #{loanNo,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) and loan_no = #{loanNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from lm_pm_shd where loan_no= #{loanNo,jdbcType=INTEGER} and ps_due_dt <=#{psDueDt,jdbcType=INTEGER} and setl_ind= #{setlInd,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by ps_perd_no asc

select
from lm_pm_shd where setl_ind= 'N' and ps_perd_no >0 and loan_no= #{loanNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ps_due_dt <=#{buzDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ( ps_gen_prod_dt !=#{buzDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or ps_gen_prod_dt is null) order by ps_perd_no asc

select
from lm_pm_shd where 1=1 and loan_no= #{loanNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ps_due_dt = (select min(ps_due_dt) from lm_pm_shd where loan_no= #{loanNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ps_due_dt >#{psDueDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) order by ps_perd_no asc

select
from lm_pm_shd where 1=1 and loan_no= #{loanNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ps_due_dt =#{buzDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (pp_er_ind='N' or pp_er_ind is null) order by ps_perd_no asc

select
from lm_pm_shd where setl_ind='N' and ps_perd_no >0 and loanNo= #{loanNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by ps_perd_no asc

select
from lm_pm_shd where setl_ind='N' and ps_perd_no >0 and loan_no= #{loanNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ps_due_dt <=#{psDueDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (comm_od_gen_dt !=#{buzDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or comm_od_gen_dt is null) order by ps_perd_no asc

select
from lm_pm_shd where 1=1 and loan_no= #{loanNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ps_due_dt = (select min(ps_due_dt) from lm_pm_shd where loan_no =#{loanNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ps_due_dt >=#{psDueDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (pp_er_ind='N' or pp_er_ind is null)) order by ps_perd_no asc

select
from lm_pm_shd where setl_ind='N' and ps_perd_no >0 and loan_no= #{loanNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ps_due_dt <=#{psDueDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by ps_perd_no asc

select
from lm_pm_shd where setl_ind='N' and ps_perd_no >0 and loan_no= #{loanNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ps_due_dt= #{psDueDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by ps_perd_no asc

select
from lm_pm_shd where 1=1 and ps_perd_no =(select max(ps_perd_no) from lm_pm_shd where loan_no =#{loanNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ps_due_dt <= #{psDueDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and loan_no= #{loanNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by ps_perd_no asc

select
from lm_pm_shd where ps_perd_no >0 and setl_ind='N' and loan_no =#{loanNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ps_due_dt <= #{psDueDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (COALESCE(ps_prcp_amt,0)+COALESCE(ps_norm_int_amt,0)-COALESCE(setl_prcp,0)-COALESCE(setl_norm_int,0)) >0 order by ps_perd_no asc

select
from lm_pm_shd where loan_no = #{loanNo}

select
from lm_pm_shd where loan_no =#{loanNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ps_due_dt >= #{psDueDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by ps_perd_no asc

select
from lm_pm_shd where 1=1 and setl_ind='N' and ps_perd_no =( select max(ps_perd_no) from lm_pm_shd where loan_no =#{loanNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ps_due_dt <= #{psDueDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) and loan_no= #{loanNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by ps_perd_no asc

= #{lmPmShd.dftfDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , dftf_amt = #{lmPmShd.dftfAmt,jdbcType=NUMERIC} , dftf_prcp_amt = #{lmPmShd.dftfPrcpAmt,jdbcType=NUMERIC} , dftf_norm_int_amt = #{lmPmShd.prcsPageDtInd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , dc_typ = #{lmPmShd.dcTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where loan_no= #{lmPmShd.loanNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ps_perd_no = #{lmPmShd.psPerdNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.select: select loan_no, ps_perd_no, ps_due_dt, ps_bill_dt, sbsy_rate, ps_instm_amt, ps_prcp_amt, ps_norm_int_amt, ps_od_int_amt, ps_comm_od_int, sbsy_int_amt, ps_fee_amt, prod_prcp_amt, prod_int_amt, prod_comm_int_amt, prod_fee_amt, ps_rem_prcp, ps_inc_taken, setl_prcp, setl_norm_int, setl_od_int_amt, setl_comm_od_int, setl_fee_amt, setl_od_inc_taken, setl_inc_taken, ps_int_rate, ps_od_int_rate, ps_od_ind, last_setl_dt, ps_od_inc_taken, ps_wv_prcp_amt, ps_wv_nm_int, ps_wv_od_int, ps_wv_comm_int, prcp_state, int_state, setl_ind, comm_od_gen_dt, pp_er_ind, ps_gen_prod_dt, ps_cur_od_inc_taken, grc_prod_prcp, grc_prod_int, grc_prod_comm, dc_instm_amt, dc_prcp_amt, dc_norm_int_amt, dc_od_int_amt, dc_comm_od_int, dc_ind, setl_mode, accp_issue_dt, acc_ind, dftf_dt, dftf_amt, dftf_prcp_amt, dftf_norm_int_amt, dftf_od_int_amt, dftf_comm_od_int_amt, prcs_page_dt_ind, dc_typ from lm_pm_shd where loan_no = #{loanNo,jdbcType=INTEGER} and ps_due_dt <= #{psDueDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by ps_perd_no asc
